S05bsu027_u:1_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ /
S05bsu027_u:1_1: tatra bhagavānāmantrayate sma - pratītyasamutpādasya vo bhikṣavaḥ ādiṃ vo deśayiṣyāmi vibhaṅgaṃ ca /
S05bsu027_u:1_2: tacchṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta,
S05bsu027_u:2_0: pratītyasamutpādasya ādiḥ katamaḥ? yaduta asmin sati idaṃ bhavati,
S05bsu027_u:2_2: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam / vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam / nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam /
S05bsu027_u:2_4_0: sparśapratyayā vedanā / vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā / tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam / upādānapratyayo
S05bsu027_u:2_5: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
S05bsu027_u:3_0: vibhaṅgaḥ katamaḥ? avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ ityavidyā katamā? yat pūrvānte 'jñānam,
S05bsu027_u:3_3: ṣaṭsu vā punaḥ sparśāyataneṣu yathābhūta(tā?)saṃprativedhaḥ iti /
S05bsu027_u:4_0: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ katame? trayaḥ saṃskārāḥ - kāyasaṃskārāḥ vāksaṃskārāḥ manaḥsaṃskārā iti /
S05bsu027_u:5_0: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānamiti vijñānaṃ katamat? ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ - cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānam /
S05bsu027_u:6_0: vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti nāma katamat? catvāra arūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ /
S05bsu027_u:6_1: katame catvāraḥ? vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ vijñānaskandhaḥ /
S05bsu027_u:6_4: catvāri ca mahābhūtānyupādāya itīdaṃ ca nāma,
S05bsu027_u:8_0: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa iti sparśaḥ katamaḥ? ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ /
S05bsu027_u:9_0: (Psvibh, Vaidya 118) sparśapratyayā vedaneti vedanā katamā? tisro vedanāḥ /
S05bsu027_u:10_0: vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇeti tṛṣṇā katamā? tisrastṛṣṇāḥ / kāmatṛṣṇā rūpatṛṣṇā arūpyatṛṣṇā ca //
S05bsu027_u:12_0: upādānapratyayo bhava iti bhavaḥ katamaḥ? trayo bhavāḥ / kāmabhavaḥ rūpabhavaḥ arūpyabhavaḥ //
S05bsu027_u:13_0_0: bhavapratyayā jātiriti jātiḥ katamā? yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye
S05bsu027_u:14_0_0: jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti jarā katamā? yattat khālatyaṃ pālityaṃ valīpracuratā
S05bsu027_u:14_0_1: jīrṇatā bhugnatā kubjagopānasīvaṅkatā tilakālakācitagātratā khuapraśvāsakāyatā purataḥ
S05bsu027_u:14_0_2: prāgbhārakāyatā daṇḍaviṣkambhaṇatā dhandhatvaṃ mandatvaḥ hāniḥ parihāṇiḥ indriyāṇāṃ
S05bsu027_u:15_0_0: maraṇaṃ karamat? yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmāttasmāt sattvanikāyāt cyutiḥ cyavanato
S05bsu027_u:15_0_1: bhedaḥ antarahāṇiḥ āyuṣo hāṇiḥ uṣmaṇo hāṇiḥ jīvitendriyasya nirodhaḥ skandhānāṃ nikṣepaḥ
S05bsu027_u:15_1: idamucyate maraṇamiti / idaṃ ca maraṇa pūrvikā ca jarā,
S05bsu027_u:16_1: pratītyasamutpādasyādiṃ vo deśayiṣyāmi iti vibhaṅgaṃ ca iti vo yaduktam,
